mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PRODUCT (PRODUCTNUM, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTPRICE, PRODUCTSTOCK, PRODUCTCATEGORIES) VALUES(SEQ_PRODUCT.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productStock}, #{productCategories})
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCTCATEGORIES FROM TBL_PRODUCT GROUP by PRODUCTCATEGORIES
SELECT * FROM TBL_PRODUCT tp JOIN TBL_FILE tf ON tp.PRODUCTNUM = tf.PRODUCTNUM WHERE PRODUCTCATEGORIES = '${value}'
SELECT * FROM TBL_PRODUCT tp JOIN TBL_FILE tf ON tp.PRODUCTNUM = tf.PRODUCTNUM WHERE tp.PRODUCTNUM = #{productNum}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum r ,f.* FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_PRODUCT tp JOIN TBL_FILE tf ON tp.PRODUCTNUM = tf.PRODUCTNUM where productCategories = '${value}' ORDER BY productCategories DESC) f) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT count(*)FROM TBL_PRODUCT tp where productCategories = '${value}'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CART (ID, PRODUCTNUM, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTPRICE, PRODUCTCATEGORIES, FILENAME, AMOUNT, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS, ADDRESSDETAIL, ADDRESSETC) VALUES(#{id}, #{productNum}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productCategories}, #{fileName}, #{amount}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{addressEtc})
